content: in this legal text a notary named master x is involved in a divorce settlement between mr x and mrs x the parties have made agreements regarding the division of their property including assets financial accounts and investments they have also addressed issues related to joint rental properties mortgages pets joint partnerships and inheritance rights the agreements will take effect upon the finalization of the divorce the text also includes details about the custody arrangement for their child including important decisions and costs it discusses the cost scheme and how expenses will be divided between the parents as well as the calculation of maintenance contributions the document mentions the possibility of wage authorization in case of nonpayment of maintenance it concludes with details about private agreements between the parents including communication guidelines and arrangements for the childs stay and contact with both parents the text also addresses relocation and modification of residence expenses regulations the document states that the agreements are provisional and will become binding upon the divorce decree it also includes information about jurisdiction litigation costs and tax statements related to the divorce proceedings the parties involved have declared their full legal capacity and have appointed a notary and sought legal counsel they have granted power of attorney to master x and signed the deed in the presence of the notary
